articles.title: How to get a multi-year Schengen visa on your Indian passport - India Today
articles.description: There039s good news for Indian passport holders who are planning to visit Europe this summer The EU is easing the Schengen visa process for frequent travellers
articles.content:
There's good news for Indian passport holders who want to visit Europe this year on. The European Union is looking to ease Schengen visa processes for Indian tourists.
